member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.GeoPackageGeoWriter.HandleOrdinates
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum to write out. The default is equivalent to .

remarks.para: The purpose of this property is to restrict what gets written out to ensure that, e.g., Z values are never written out even if present on a geometry instance. Ordinates that are not present on a geometry instance will be omitted regardless of this value.
Flags not present in are silently ignored.
